languages.text: "Как необычно. Для меня Имматериум состоит из цветов, но для астропатов, обитающих в этой капелле, он — музыка".
"How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths who dwell in this chapel, it is music."
languages.original_text: "Как необычно. Для меня Имматериум состоит из цветов, но для астропатов, обитающих в этой капелле, он — музыка".

traits.locale_text: "How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths, it is music."
"How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths, it is music."
"How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths, it is music."
"How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths, it is music."
"How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths who dwell in this chapel, it is music."
"How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths who dwell in this chapel, it is music."
"How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths who dwell in this chapel, it is music."

languages.text: "Faszinierend. Für mich besteht das Immaterium Farben, doch für die Astropathen in dieser Kapelle besteht es aus Musik."
languages.original_text: "How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths who dwell in this chapel, it is music."

traits.locale_text: "Wie faszinierend. Für mich besteht das Immaterium Farben, doch für die Astropathen besteht es aus Musik."

languages.text: « Fascinant. À mes yeux, l'Immaterium est fait de couleurs, mais les astropathes qui résident dans cette chapelle, eux, y voient de la musique. »
languages.original_text: "How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths who dwell in this chapel, it is music."

traits.locale_text: « Fascinant. À mes yeux, l'Immaterium est fait de couleurs, mais les astropathes, eux, y voient de la musique. »

languages.text: «Es fascinante. Para mí, el Inmaterio está hecho de colores, mientras que para los Astrópatas de esta capilla, es música».
languages.original_text: "How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths who dwell in this chapel, it is music."

traits.locale_text: «Es fascinante. Para mí, el Inmaterio está hecho de colores, mientras que para los Astrópatas es música».

languages.text: 「なんと魅力的なことでしょう。非物質世界は色で満ち溢れています。でもこの礼拝堂に住む感応通信官にとっては、それは音楽なのです」
languages.original_text: "How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths who dwell in this chapel, it is music."

traits.locale_text: 「興味深いわ。非物質世界は色で満ち溢れています。でも感応通信官にとって、それは音楽なのですね」

languages.text: “这实在是太迷人了。对我来说，亚空间是由无数颜色构成的，而对居住在这座礼拜堂的星语者而言，它是由无数音符构成的。”
languages.original_text: "How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths who dwell in this chapel, it is music."

traits.locale_text: “这实在是太迷人了。对我来说，亚空间是由无数颜色构成的，而对星语者而言，它是由无数音符构成的。”

languages.original_text: "How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths who dwell in this chapel, it is music."

languages.text: "Ne kadar da etkileyici. Tindiyar, benim gözümde rengârenktir. Ancak bu şapelde yaşayan Astropatların gözünde müziktir."
languages.original_text: "How fascinating. To me, the Immaterium is made of colours, but to the Astropaths who dwell in this chapel, it is music."
